cn.donthaveplan: 没有任何计划，请先创建一个
cn.timetypedescription: 绝对时间意味着你设置任务在9:00AM开始，那么任务就在9:00AM开始；相对时间意味着计划在9:00PM启动，任务在1:00AM，则在10:00AM收到提示，任务在2:20PM，则在11:20PM获得提示
cn.fntext: 填写每一个空格，然后再试一次。
cn.rgctext: 你真的要退出当前的相对时间计划吗？
cn.dctext: 你真的要删除这个任务吗？
cn.rctext: 你真的要进入相对时间计划吗？

en.outrplan: Get out of a Relative Plan
en.pplanname: Enter the Name of the Plan Here
en.timetypedescription: Absolute Time means you set 10:00 AM, and alarm goes off at 10:00 AM. Relative Time means you set 1:00 AM, and start the plan at 10:00 AM, the alarm goes off at 11:00 AM, if you set 1:20 PM (13:20), the alarm goes off at 11:20 PM (23:20)
en.petitle: Select a Plan and Make Changes
en.pedeletecheck: Are you sure to delete this plan? All the tasks in the plan will vanish.
en.loctext: Are you going to log out?
en.fntext: Make sure you filled every line, then try again.
en.lmntext: You must at least have one plan.
en.rgctext: Are you sure to get out of a relative plan?
en.dctext: Are you sure to delete this task?
en.rctext: Are you sure to start/restart a relative plan?
en.ttaskname: Enter the Name of the Task Here
